sub_topic: Finding the perimeter of a regular polygon.
message_1: A regular hexagon has a side length of 8 cm. What is the perimeter of the hexagon?
message_2:
A regular hexagon has six equal sides. Since each side has a length of 8 cm, the perimeter of the hexagon is 6 times the side length. 

Perimeter = 6 * 8 cm = 48 cm
